txt_content:

ANNOUNCING… OFFICIAL MINECRAFT COMMUNITY EVENTS公告：Minecraft官方社区活动
Meet, greet, compete!会见、问好，以及竞争！
Just a few minutes ago we announced MINECON Earth - an interactive live show coming to your screens this November! Read more about that on our dedicated page.

就在几分钟前，我们宣布举办MINECON Earth——一个互动直播节目。它将于今年11月来到你的屏幕上！请在我们的专页上阅读更多有关这方面的信息。

But for many members of our community, making new friends while getting to meet their favourite youTubers is one of the things that made previous MINECONs so special. For that reason we’re also planning a whole new type of Minecraft show. One that will take place a little closer to home. We’re excited to present: Official Minecraft Community Events!

对于社区里的许多成员来说，结交新朋友，与他们最喜欢的youtube主播见面是一件让之前几届MINECON变得如此特别的事情。出于这个原因，我们也在计划着一个全新的Minecraft节目，而它举办的位置离你家很近。所以，我们很荣幸地为您呈献：Minecraft官方社区活动！

Unlike previous MINECONs, these local gatherings will be hosted by community-led partners such as Minefaire, Minevention and Blockfest (a brand new event by the nice folks at Multiplay. These partners (along with many more to come) have gained our official stamp of approval to throw authentic in-person Minecraft experiences. You’ll get to meet your favourite YouTubers and streamers, compete in tournaments and costume contests, see unique content and more.

与前几届MINECON不同，这些当地聚会将由主导社区的合作伙伴们来举办，比如Minefaire、Minevention和Blockfest（Multiplay中的友好人士发起的全新活动）。这些合作伙伴（还有更多）已经取得了我们的官方授权，它们可以举办Minecraft的活动。你将会遇到你最喜欢的youtube主播和stream主播，参加各类比赛，看到许多独特的新玩意……等等等等。

We’ll have more info on community events in the near future so watch out for one happening in your area soon!

我们会陆续公布更多关于社区活动的信息，所以请持续关注你所在地区的相关动态！


原文链接：https://minecraft.net/zh-hans/article/community-events

原文发布日期：2017年8月8日
